CV

Presentations

Invited PhD Seminar: Labor Economics, Chair of Microeconometrics, University of Hamburg (2017). Seminar on Statistics and Econometrics, Institute for Statistics & Econometrics, CAU Kiel (2019).

2021 ASSA Meeting, virtual; SEEK-Workshop on “Social Mobility and Economic Performance”, ZEW Mannheim; ifo Workshop on “Opportunities, Mobility and Well-Being”, ifo Institute Munich; ESPE Annual Conference, virtual.

Daniel Graeber's webpage. Daniel is interested in health economics, economics of migration and intergenerational mobility. He is a postdoctoral researcher at the DIW Berlin.
